_header: Man remember whence thou come and wither thou shalt
Title(s): And to thyn evyn Cristyn do no wronge
_description: On just dealing: ‘& to thyn evyn Cristyn do no wronge’ — one couplet

OxfBal354.Transcription:
Man remembre when þou com & wher þou shalt& to thyn
                    evyn Cristyn do no wronge
